help-file.title: FISHING
help-file.content:
Syntax: <fish> while standing on water.
The lakes and oceans of Duris are like most oceans filled with creatures that live in them. Using a standard fishing pole the creatures of Duris can attempt to catch fish and sea food. The chance of catching something is dependant on the skill of the person and chance. The fish and sea food will increase the hitpoint regeneration and sometimes movement regeneration for a period of time. The duration and speed depends on what type of fish or sea food that was consumed.
There are different types that can be caught are the following. Please note that they are now listed in order of how good they are.
a large bass a piranha a medium sized cod a large pike fish an impressive lobster a large hairy crab a large shrimp a large flat oyster a small clam a large mussel
